类 LaneCenteringAssistCommand

    • android.car.hardware.property.LaneCenteringAssistCommand

extends java.lang.Object
    Used by VehiclePropertyIds.LANE_CENTERING_ASSIST_COMMAND to enumerate commands.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int ACTIVATE
      When VehiclePropertyIds.LANE_CENTERING_ASSIST_STATE = LaneCenteringAssistState.ENABLED, this command sends a request to activate steering control that keeps the vehicle centered in its lane.
      static int DEACTIVATE
      When VehiclePropertyIds.LANE_CENTERING_ASSIST_STATE is set to LaneCenteringAssistState.ACTIVATION_REQUESTED or LaneCenteringAssistState.ACTIVATED, this command deactivates steering control and the driver should take full control of the vehicle.

    • 字段详细资料

      • ACTIVATE

        public static final int ACTIVATE
        When VehiclePropertyIds.LANE_CENTERING_ASSIST_STATE = LaneCenteringAssistState.ENABLED, this command sends a request to activate steering control that keeps the vehicle centered in its lane. While waiting for the LCA System to take control of the vehicle, VehiclePropertyIds.LANE_CENTERING_ASSIST_STATE will be in the LaneCenteringAssistState.ACTIVATION_REQUESTED state. Once the vehicle takes control of steering, then VehiclePropertyIds.LANE_CENTERING_ASSIST_STATE will be in the LaneCenteringAssistState.ACTIVATED state. Otherwise, an error can be communicated through an ErrorState value.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • DEACTIVATE

        public static final int DEACTIVATE
        When VehiclePropertyIds.LANE_CENTERING_ASSIST_STATE is set to LaneCenteringAssistState.ACTIVATION_REQUESTED or LaneCenteringAssistState.ACTIVATED, this command deactivates steering control and the driver should take full control of the vehicle. If this command succeeds, VehiclePropertyIds.LANE_CENTERING_ASSIST_STATE will be updated to LaneCenteringAssistState.ENABLED.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(int laneCenteringAssistCommand)
        Returns a user-friendly representation of a LaneCenteringAssistCommand.
